description: A splash jacket only on paper, on the water, the NRS Men's Riptide Jacket delivers advanced waterproof, breathable protection for paddlers willing to gamble on the conditions. Features an articulated hood and half-zip neck for quick adaptability, kayak overskirt and neoprene wrist gaskets for all-day comfort.
name: NRS Canada Riptide Splash Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Adjustable polyurethane hook-and-loop with quick-venting half-zip
Kayak overskirt to mate with sprayskirt, bungee drawcord
